algorithm_technique: Kadane's algorithm variation to find max and min subarray sums
problem_summary_simple: Find the subarray with the largest absolute sum.
problem_summary_technical: Uses a modified Kadane's algorithm to track both the maximum and minimum subarray sums encountered so far.
key_insights: The maximum absolute sum is either the maximum positive subarray sum or the absolute value of the minimum negative subarray sum.
Kadane's algorithm can be adapted to find both the maximum and minimum subarray sums in a single pass.
The difference between the maximum and minimum prefix sums gives the maximum subarray sum.
